pub_created_display: Ardashir I (224 to 240), Drachm, Group/ Mint A ("Stakhr")
issue_place_s: Group/ Mint A ("Stakhr"), Fars, Sasanian Empire
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap edged with a double row of pearls, crescent and dot in the center of lateral field; diadem, ends of diadem ribbons to the left and right; row of pearls from the shoulder to the breast; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 1 h l. i. bgy 'rthštr[y]- 10 h l. o. MLKA| bay Ardašir šāh| "The divine Ardashir, King"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Papag on frontal bust; crown cap edged with a double row of pearls, crescent and dot in the center of lateral field; diadem, pendent diadem ribbons; cheek-flaps; row of pearls on neck-cutout; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 1 h l. i. BRE bgy p'pky- 10 l. o. MRKA| Pus bay Pābag šāh| "Son of the divine Papag, King"
issue_references_s: SNS  Group/ Mint A ("Stakhr") Type I/1
